about_the_game:
This set includes character pieces that can be used on the Grim Garten board after Part II Intermission, as well as shoulder-mounted attachment items.
Character Piece: Agnes, Saint of Purity
Character Piece: Elaine, Maiden of the Sword
Character Piece: Kevin, Guardian of the Star Grail
Shoulder-Mounted Agnes, Saint of Purity
Shoulder-Mounted Elaine, Maiden of the Sword
Shoulder Mounted Kevin, Guardian of the Star Grail
Character Piece: Rean, Divine Blade of Ash
Character Piece: Shizuna, Divine Blade of Silver
Character Piece: Rufus, Dark Apostate
Shoulder-Mounted Rean, Divine Blade of Ash
Shoulder-Mounted Shizuna, Divine Blade of Silver
Shoulder Mounted Rufus, Dark Apostate
*After unlocking items, change character pieces via [Change Avatar] in the Grim Garten menu. [Change Avatar] unlocks after clearing Part II Intermission.

DLC-exclusive headgear set featuring the heads of the popular mascots Mishy and friends, beloved throughout the Republic of Calvard.
Mishy Head
Mishette Head
Evil Mishy Head

DLC-exclusive attachment replica weapons.
Miriam's White Sword (Right)
Miriam's White Sword (Left)
Ishmelga's Black Sword (Right)
Ishmelga's Black Sword (Left)
Arianrhod's Cavalry Lance (Right)
Arianrhod's Cavalry Lance (Left)

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Attachment items can be changed via [EQUIP] -> [Costume] in the main menu.
*Digital Deluxe Edition and Digital Ultimate Edition and Premier Pass are also available. Beware of duplicate purchases.
